main event: A civilian observed a UFO over Amarillo, Texas on April 26, 1949.
interesting points: The observer noted the UFO was at an altitude of 500 feet above the plains., The UFO was observed flying in level and horizontal maneuvers., The sighting lasted between 1.5 to 20 minutes., The object was described as circular in shape and about 70 feet in diameter., Other observers reported seeing a light moving at jet-like speeds.
